articles.title: Oldest planetary debris in our galaxy found in new study - Phys.org
articles.description: Astronomers led by the University of Warwick have identified the oldest star in our galaxy that is accreting debris from orbiting planetesimals, making it one of the oldest rocky and icy planetary systems discovered in the Milky Way.
